table.name: Insured_Relationship
table.enum: Natural/Adopted Child (Insured does not have Financial Resp.)
Minor Dependent of a Minor Dependent

table.name: Auth_Signature
table.description: A code used to indicate whether the provider has a signature from the patient on file. Provided by Envoy Document DA0.16. Used for processing NSF claims.

row.col: Signed HCFA-1500 claim form on file
Authorization form for HCFA Block 12 on file
Authorization form for HCFA Block 13 on file
Authorization form for HCFA Blocks 12and 13 on file

table.name: Auth_Assign
table.description: A code used to indicate whether the provider and the beneficiary have a signed mutual agreement authorizing the Medicare carrier to pay the provider. Provided by Envoy Document EA0.34. Used for processing NSF claims.

table.name: PPO_HMO_Indicator
table.description: An indicator that the provider is submitting this claim to or has submitted this claim to the indicated payer under a Special Processing Agreement. Provided by Envoy Document DA0.12. Used for processing NSF claims.

table.name: Insurance_Type_Code
table.description: Identifies type of insurance policy. Provided by Envoy Document DA0.06. Used for processing NSF claims.

table.name: HCFA1500_Modifier_Code
table.description: List of Modifiers. Includes EPSDT and workers comp modifiers.

Return to Operating Room for Related Procedure (PostOp Period)

Ambulance service furnished directly by provider
Repeat laboratory test performed on the same day
Excision/destruction due to signs and symptoms
Injection necessary as the oral route contraindicated
Injection into joints, sheaths, trigger points necessary
Injectable medication is accepted treatment of choice
Temp over 102 high level antibiotics required
Medical direction of employees by anesthesiologist
Supervision of more than 4 concurrent services
Necessary Equipment is in Physicians Office
Service performed by resident under supervision
Physician Assistant acting as asst surgeon
Greater than or equal to 2 yrs
Greater than or equal to 1 yr, less than 2
TWCC 73 form when requested by the carrier
TWCC 73 form re-requested by the carrier
Item or service prov. as routine care in an apprv. clin. trial

table.description: List of Place of Service. Provided by Envoy Exhibit 5 for processing NSF claims.

table.description: List of Type of Service. Provided by Envoy Exhibit 6 for processing NSF claims.

table.name: Medical_Specialty
table.description: List of physician specialties. Provided by Envoy Exhibit 3 for processing NSF claims.
